--- In cantera@yahoogroups.com, David Goodwin <dgoodwin@c...> wrote:
> Since many people have said that they would be interested in a Cantera 
> workshop this July in Chicago, we will plan on holding one. I would 
> like to enlist a few interested people to help with the logistics and 
> planning. I will be contacting some of you who have volunteered your 
> services for this in a few days.  The time, location, duration, and 
> agenda are all to be determined.  My inclination is to make it a 
> half-day workshop, but nothing has been decided yet. Stay tuned for 
> more details...
> 


Hi David,

May we have some precisions according to the workshop organisation, so
that we can "force" our administration to support us for the meeting?

Congratulations for the great job done so far.

Best regards

Christophe MATIGNON
